Title: Separation by Saturation
Description:
Oh jewelcrafter, do you like my necklace?

Of course you do. But I cannot show it off properly unless it stands out.

I know! Why don't you make a few simple pendants and we shall flood the market. Once everyone is wearing your designs, my necklace will be a sparkling cut above the rest!
ObjectivesText: Craft 2 Pendants of Impending Perils for Tuluradormi in Valdrakken.
